'''Radiant Spincrystal 114''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Un nouvel espoir]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a table in the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]].
